title: Multiply
text: Multiply both sides by $$2$$ to eliminate the fraction.
speech: Multiply both sides by  2  to eliminate the fraction.

title: Divide
text: Divide on both sides by $$h$$, then subtract $$b_1$$ from both sides in order to isolate $$b_2$$.
speech: Divide on both sides by , h , then subtract  b sub 1  from both sides in order to isolate  b sub 2 .
